issue.title: twitch.tv annoyance "Running ad block? Consider Turbo"

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Mac

### AdGuard version

2.16.3.1867

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.twitch.tv/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter

### Privacy

AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Today while watching any stream a popup started to appear with text
> Running ad block? Consider Turbo.
> Twitch Turbo enables ad-free viewing while still supporting streamers.

There were [news recently](https://www.dexerto.com/twitch/twitch-joins-war-on-ad-blockers-by-hitting-users-with-discouraging-messages-3029595/) Twitch joined ad blocker war.

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/57b23b67-f567-427b-b780-2401ffe37e41)

</details>

It appears every couple of minutes, very annoying and unusable.

I also have ublock chrome extension, but I disabled it on twitch - didn't help.
<details>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d47a7695-4303-42c3-84a8-9a6f89c7d5b6)

</details>

I also added all known twitch domains to the Adguard white list - didn't help either. Maybe there are some more exist
<details>

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/5136a0df-901f-4570-80c0-6751942fbd0a)

</details>

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Hi, thanks for the additional info. Before my last message, I did actually try unblocking all rules in the filtering log, but this had no effect on the issue. There is no “Unlock all” option that I can see in the Filtering Log though. What I did was unblock all rules in the Blocked section until all of them were unblocked, and the list was clear. But since neither the **AdGuard URL Tracking filter** nor the **Legitimate URL Shortener** show up in the list (as you can see here below), unblocking the rules from other filters has no effect on the error.

issue.title: Zhihu is a software that bypasses rules to track users
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.9 nightly 2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.zhihu.com/app/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

你可以看图中的url，这个软件会通过IP来绕过规则，host后面的域名已经被Adguard DNS过滤器禁止了，所以这个软件就会通过IP绕过封禁，从url内容可以知道这是用于跟踪的，会上传操作系统信息，软件版本号等等。我就通过禁止IP来阻挡，当然还有另一种方法，为了方便，假设host后面的域名为A。 `||*A*`  这条规则能拦截下面的url，我试过了，并且对软件使用没有任何不利影响。我推荐使用通配符。
我建议将新规则添加到Adguard DNS过滤器和Adguard 防跟踪过滤器中。host后面的域名已经被你的DNS过滤器拦截，你们只需要在原有的规则上加上 `*`
![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6b7436f4-5f06-4c65-b6e6-74ce22a33884)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition
